name: User Survey Library
description:
Why this project?

I was learning about formulating better questions for the user survey.


In the process, I scanned my inbox to see what kind of questions big brands ask? How do they make the question neutral?


These screenshots were the outcome of the exercise.

Hope you also learn from them. Cheers!
